casebody.data:
Bert CRABTREE v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5136. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. May 27, 1955. Arnold Alperstein, Denver, Colo., for appellant. William C. Farmer, U. S. Atty., Wichita, Kan., and Royce D. Sickler and Selby S. Soward, Asst. U. S. Attys., Topeka, Kan., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, MURRAH and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
